title: Lonely Blade V
description: After learning who killed his brother, Lonely Blade receives a visit from someone claiming to be him.
altHero: Lonely Blade wields two swords in the rain
alt1: Lonely Blade speaks with an undead man
alt2: close-up of the undead man’s face, groteque and soulless
alt4: Lonely Blade raises two swords, lightning strikes behind him
